title: Bugs - Insecticide or a Buyer Needed
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Bugs - Insecticide or a Buyer Needed
posts.post_content:
Three cards are offered.  Buy any one card for $50.  Buy the second card for $45 (that's $95 for two).  Buy the third card for $40 (that's $135).  Payment for shipping is optional if you pay for the cardboard sandwich.:eek:

#1 - HOOKS - portrait without cap - Sovereign 150 reverse - VG+ (BVG 3.5) SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10238/wiltse-no-cap-sov[/IMG]

#2 - WINE - actually Bugs Raymond - Polar Bear reverse - VG (PSA 3)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10557/raymond-pb[/IMG]

#3 - TINKER - hands on knees - Sweet Cap 150 reverse - Ungraded SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10959/tinker-hands-on-knees[/IMG]

Prices apply to a single buyer.  If cards remain, the second buyer will pay $50 for his first card and so forth.

Please note: "Bugs" and wine were no strangers, hence the poetic license

Frank's Choice the Three Card Parlay
I'm not a wine guy, but I'll take Hooks and Tinker.

Frank...you kill me.  That is all.

Cheers,
Geno
